<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Perfect Form Control](/Feats.aspx?ID=351) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 139 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Form Control](/Feats.aspx?ID=321); Strength 18

</column>

---

Thanks to magic and muscle memory, you can stay in your alternate forms indefinitely; you may have even forgotten your original form. When you use Form Control, instead of lasting 1 hour, [_wild shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=481) is permanent until you Dismiss it.
name: Perfect Form Control
